tool_description: Check if a website is available or not
name: WebsiteStatus
title: WebsiteStatus

api_list.name: WebsiteStatus
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://websitestatus.p.rapidapi.com/websiteStatus"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "websitestatus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://websitestatus.p.rapidapi.com/websiteStatus"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "websitestatus.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
